熗字的基本解释

熗
qiàng
见“炝”。

熗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiàng］
“炝1”的繁体字。
(1)一种烹饪方法。将菜肴放在沸水中略煮，取出后拌作料。如炝蛤蜊。
(2)一种烹饪方法。先把肉菜等用热油略炒，再加作料和水煮。如炝锅肉丝面。
(3)同“嗆2”。有刺激性的气体进入呼吸器官而感觉难受。

熗字的康熙字典解释

炝
Basic explanation of words
炝
qiàng
See "炝".
炝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiàng］
Traditional characters for "炝1".
(1) A cooking method. Boil the dishes in boiling water, take them out and mix with the ingredients. Such as clams.
(2) A cooking method. Fry meat and vegetables in hot oil first, then add seasoning and boil. Such as steamed pork noodles.
(3) Same as "Choke 2". The irritating gas enters the respiratory organs and feels uncomfortable.
